Package com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.cosmos.properties

Class AzureCosmosProperties

java.lang.Object
com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.properties.core.AbstractAzureServiceConfigurationProperties
com.azure.spring.cloud.autoconfigure.implementation.cosmos.properties.AzureCosmosProperties
All Implemented Interfaces:
AzureProperties, KeyProvider, TokenCredentialOptionsProvider, AzureProfileOptionsProvider, ClientOptionsProvider, ProxyOptionsProvider, CosmosClientProperties
public class AzureCosmosProperties extends AbstractAzureServiceConfigurationProperties implements CosmosClientProperties
Configuration properties for Cosmos database, consistency, telemetry, connection, query metrics and diagnostics.
